name: AI Upscaler Plugin
overview: AI-Powered Video Upscaling Plugin with Docker Microservice Architecture
description: Revolutionary AI upscaling plugin with Docker-based AI processing. Eliminates native DLL conflicts. Features automated hardware benchmarking, intelligent fallback system, pre-processing cache, and sidebar integration.
changelog: v1.5.0.3: Fixed Save Configuration button not working on some systems (Discussion #38). Added robust event initialization with fallback mechanisms.
